title: categorical features in LightGBM caused "could not convert string to float" in TreeExplainer
body:
This works:
```
gbm = lgb.LGBMClassifier()
gbm.fit(X_train, y_train,
        eval_set=[(X_test, y_test)])
explainer = shap.TreeExplainer(gbm)
```

This:
```
gbm = lgb.LGBMClassifier()
gbm.fit(X_train, y_train,
        eval_set=[(X_test, y_test)],
        categorical_feature=category_columns)
explainer = shap.TreeExplainer(gbm)
```

Caused this:
```
ValueError                                Traceback (most recent call last)
<ipython-input-53-6ed41ccbc5d7> in <module>()
----> 1 explainer = shap.TreeExplainer(gbm)
      2 # shap_values = explainer.shap_values(X_test)

~/.local/lib/python3.5/site-packages/shap/explainers/tree.py in __init__(self, model, **kwargs)
    101             self.model = model.booster_
    102             tree_info = self.model.dump_model()["tree_info"]
--> 103             self.trees = [Tree(e, scaling=len(tree_info)) for e in tree_info]
    104         elif str(type(model)).endswith("catboost.core.CatBoostRegressor'>"):
    105             self.model_type = "catboost"

~/.local/lib/python3.5/site-packages/shap/explainers/tree.py in <listcomp>(.0)
    101             self.model = model.booster_
    102             tree_info = self.model.dump_model()["tree_info"]
--> 103             self.trees = [Tree(e, scaling=len(tree_info)) for e in tree_info]
    104         elif str(type(model)).endswith("catboost.core.CatBoostRegressor'>"):
    105             self.model_type = "catboost"

~/.local/lib/python3.5/site-packages/shap/explainers/tree.py in __init__(self, tree, normalize, scaling)
    380                             self.children_default[vertex['split_index']] = self.children_right[vertex['split_index']]
    381                         self.features[vertex['split_index']] = vertex['split_feature']
--> 382                         self.thresholds[vertex['split_index']] = vertex['threshold']
    383                         self.values[vertex['split_index']] = [vertex['internal_value']]
    384                         self.node_sample_weight[vertex['split_index']] = vertex['internal_count']

ValueError: could not convert string to float: '1||3||4||5||7||13||14||16||20||24||33||35||38||40||42||47||51||53||54||55'
```

lightgbm 2.1.2  
shap 0.20.1  
Ubuntu 16.04
